<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="buyer">09206a6fc34c121061bd1c377d013102</macroponent><name>rich_text_7/html</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({ api, helpers }) {
    const productData = api.data.productData;
    const endTimeStr = api.data.look_up_a_single_record_1.result.start_time.displayValue;

    // Parse the endTime string into a Date object
    const endTime = new Date(endTimeStr).getTime();
    const now = new Date().getTime();

    const distance = endTime - now;

    if (distance < 0) {
        return "Auction Ended";
    } else {
        const days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
        const hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
        const minutes = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
        const seconds = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
        return `${days}d ${hours}h ${minutes}m ${seconds}s`;
    }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-29 13:50:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe435679c318de1061bd1c377d013196</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>rich_text_7/html</sys_name><sys_package display_value="auction" source="x_1520630_auction">e8166963c3c4121061bd1c377d013188</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="auction">e8166963c3c4121061bd1c377d013188</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fe435679c318de1061bd1c377d013196</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-29 13:53:31</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
